headline: Automate with Google Workspace & leverage AI | Entrepreneurship | SaaS | Investing | Sports & Health | Design | Fatherhood x5
about: Yannick is CEO of award winning, Google recommended Sheetgo, which allows everyday workspace and office users to automate their work. Previously he co-founded a 'best for the world' B-Corp real estate developer that designed and built thousands of social eco-homes in Brazil. He spent a decade in tech-focused top US corporate companies after graduating in computer systems, finance, marketing, and industrial engineering. He has published articles and a book, given dozens of speeches including TEDx and Columbia University, while being featured in publications like The Economist. He has 5 children and loves sports, design, and music.
addressWithCountry: Boadilla del Monte, Community of Madrid, Spain
validation_reasons_spanish: Experiencia como CEO en una empresa SaaS exitosa.; Experiencia en automatización con Google Workspace e IA.; Experiencia en inversión y emprendimiento.; Amplia experiencia en tecnología y finanzas.; Orador en eventos TEDx y Columbia University.
validation_reasons_english: CEO experience in a successful SaaS company.; Experience in automation with Google Workspace and AI.; Experience in investment and entrepreneurship.; Extensive experience in technology and finance.; Speaker at TEDx events and Columbia University.

headline: Fundador de MIO Group y de la Asociación de Inversores y Emprendedores de Internet (AIEI). Inversor en más de 40 compañías a través de Viriditas.
validation_reasons_spanish: Experiencia como fundador de MIO Group, una empresa relacionada con marketing y publicidad.; Inversor en más de 40 compañías a través de Viriditas, lo que demuestra un historial de inversión activo.; Fundador de la Asociación de Inversores y Emprendedores de Internet (AIEI), lo que sugiere una fuerte conexión con el ecosistema emprendedor.; Título de 'Presidente' indica un alto nivel de experiencia y liderazgo empresarial.
validation_reasons_english: Experience as founder of MIO Group, a company related to marketing and advertising.; Investor in more than 40 companies through Viriditas, demonstrating a history of active investment.; Founder of the Internet Investors and Entrepreneurs Association (AIEI), suggesting a strong connection to the entrepreneurial ecosystem.; Title of 'President' indicates a high level of business experience and leadership.

headline: Global COO and UK managing director @ Lura Care |  Co-founder @ Commly.ai
about:
Entrepreneur with 20+ years of experience building and scaling businesses across diverse industries. I thrive on strategic thinking, innovation, and leadership, knowing that true success lies in the ability to execute ideas effectively.

I am currently focused on expanding the reach and impact of Lura Care, a domiciliary healthcare provider, as Global COO and managing Director in the UK, improving care for those who need it most.

As co-founder of Commo (est. 2004), I’ve helped launch and grow over 30 startups by advising clients on marketing, branding, PR, and advertising strategies. I also ventured into entrepreneurship with my own startup, Chopit, which aimed to empower retailers to compete in the digital era by delivering personalized shopping experiences. While the project didn’t succeed as planned, it was a valuable lesson in resilience and innovation.

Earlier in my career, I worked as a management consultant at Cluster (now Oliver Wyman), where I played a key role in building telecom operators and internet startups across Spain, Latin America, and India.

With a background in Telecom Engineering and an MBA from IESE Business School, I am passionate about leveraging technology to create human-centered solutions. I believe in driving opportunity-led transformation for businesses to embrace the future with confidence.

Let’s connect if you share an interest in innovation, leadership, or creating meaningful impact through business.
validation_reasons_spanish: Experiencia en el sector salud domiciliaria.; Experiencia en consultoría estratégica para startups.; MBA de IESE Business School.; Experiencia en marketing, branding y publicidad para startups.; Interés en innovación y soluciones centradas en el ser humano.
validation_reasons_english: Experience in the domiciliary healthcare sector.; Experience in strategic consulting for startups.; MBA from IESE Business School.; Experience in marketing, branding, and advertising for startups.; Interest in innovation and human-centered solutions.

headline: Partner at Telegraph Hill Capital
about: Venture Capital Investor at Telegraph Hill Capital. Investing in early stage mobile focused companies in US and Europe. 24 investments with 3 exits.
validation_reasons_spanish: Experiencia en Venture Capital con Telegraph Hill Capital.; Inversión en empresas en etapa inicial con enfoque en móvil en EE. UU. y Europa.; Experiencia significativa en el sector de capital de riesgo y capital privado.; MBA del IESE Business School.
